item.title: Grass cutting to be done, 25th September
item.description:
Alongside 1 Tern Court Rookery Rd (lamppost 21) this grass needs cutting regularly as it was done just the once this year. TBC used to do this and maintain it regularly. Small patch gets done (last photo) by contractors monthly opposite but the bigger parts do not get cut, why ? Please maintain these areas as they used to be done in previous years. Looks so untidy and scruffy.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rookery Road, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Footbridge by St George’s churchyard, 25th September
item.description:
The footbridge that crosses Horsbeare brook along footpath leading from the rear burial ground of St George’s Church Brockworth has been altered and a huge tree trunk is now being used to support the bridge at one end. This has created a ridiculously high step up to the bridge which I am positive is causing a lot of problems for people accessing this route. This was done many months ago and I have previously complained about it but no response forthcoming Could it please be looked at and made more easily accessible. Also the vegetation along the path needs cutting back.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Park, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped rubbish, 25th September
item.description:
In Thornbury Close at the rear of 40, 41 and 44 Alstone Avenue. Thornbury Close is a private road BUT IT IS OWNED BY CHELTENHAM BOROUGH COUNCIL. Please check your records and tidy up this mess.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 46, Alstone Avenue, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Frame of old roadworks sign left on grassy triangle of ground, 25th September
item.description:
